video_title: What would you tell YOUR FRIEND?
transcript:
I often talk to guys who on the abstract
level at least seem to be fairly
knowledgeable about women and
relationships in the sexual Marketplace
in general but for whatever reason
probably because they've already decided
to become emotionally involved with
these particular women and because
they've already progressed the
relationship to this point they can have
a lot of trouble applying these abstract
Concepts to their own particular cases
so I'm going to save a lot of men a lot
of trouble today because I've been
having these consultations a lot
recently before you call me up or you
hire someone else or talk to a therapist
or a life coach or whatever just listen
to yourself open a recorder app and
record yourself I'm serious literally
record yourself talking about your
relationship concerns for 5 minutes then
imagine that this document was sent to
you from a good friend about his
relationship how would you respond
